statement.p: In 48.57 of the last 35 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{35}}={0.4857}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{35}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4857}\cdot{35}={16.9995}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 35-16.9995=18.0005 We round that as requested to 18.
